name: Rapid Repair System
desc:
Shieldless ships are incredibly vulnerable to crippling EMP attacks to their weapons and engines. To compensate for this, Junker hulls have widespread underlying damage control infrastructure throughout the hull which would otherwise be occupied by shield generators. Junker weapons and engines repair %s faster and take %s less damage.

name: Techmined Hull
desc: Based on a semi-complete, incredibly advanced design discovered by Hazard Mining Incorporated, this vessel has fundamental problems in its construction as a product of lacking sophisticated manufacturing techniques and a more complete blueprint. This vessel suffers from a %s increase in CR degradation past its peak time, ship repairs take %s longer outside of combat, and the ship takes an additional %s damage from hyperspace storms, coronas and event horizons.
short: This ship suffers from problems which makes CR degrade faster, recover CR and repair slower, and take more damage due to terrain effects.

name: Categorical Mount Dampeners
desc: The ballistic integration in the Category is unique for its recoil reduction and the ability to enhance pin-point long-range targeting. All ballistic weapons receive %s less recoil and a flat range bonus of %s.

name: Reinforced Weapon Chassis
desc: The modifications to the Barber's chassis include a considerable amount of alteration to the vessels armour and weapon's mechanisms to ensure that space dust and asteroid impacts do not compromise long-term maintenance of the vessel. Weapon health increased by %s.
short: The Barber's weapons are incredibly resilient.

name: Linked Hull
desc: Mirrors certain aspects between the parent and child hulls.

name: Improvised Station Hull
desc:
This vessel was originally designed for geosynchronous orbit, not for interstellar travel. The alterations to ensure this ship is able to move between stars involved a fair amount of jury-rigging and dangerous improvisation. A large amount of the alterations were dedicated to ensuring the ex-station can withstand the forces of the engines without crumpling in on itself. This has had the unfortunate impact of dedicating the power systems from the shields to the engines, while the engines themselves are difficult to apply additional modification to. Integrating a %s will %s. Applying a %s will result in the %s. Equipping %s will reduce range by an additional %s. However, the sheer mass and size of the main part of the vessel means that %s. Modules lack this damage mitigation, being smaller sections of the strucutre.

The large bulk of the station, combined with the inefficient engines, increases sensor profile by %s.
short: Increases sensor strength and profile.

name: Conjugated Accuracy Computer
desc: Integrates a large, complex targeting computer into the ship. While this increases the weapon range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s, the ship becomes comprimised in several respects. The speed and maneuverability is inhibited by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size due to the bulk of the assembly. Further, passive venting reduced by %s  to prevent the computer being damaged by wild swings in the ship energy systems. Finally, if overloaded, the computer will require a lengthy restart and reorientation sequence, increasing overload time by %s. Incompatible with Safety Overrides, Integrated Targeting Unit, Dedicated Targeting Core and Advanced Optics.
short: A large targeting computer that drastically increases range, but reduces speed, movement and venting.

name: Supplementary Surveying Suite

The Monjeau's key feature, the Combat Intelligence Armour multiplies the effective armour strength for damage reduction by %s, with maximum armour damage reduction increased by %s. An extension of this effect is that %s have very little impact on armour.

The armour also protects the weapon emplacements and engine assembly, reducing EMP damage by %s and giving weapons an extra %s health points. However, due to the Comgence Armour utilising the entire vessel to support its damage reduction abilities, there is %s.

desc: The Dromedary is a ship well known for it's low supply cost, being legendary for its ease of use, ease of acquiring parts, and sheer resilience of the components once integrated. Supply cost reduced by %s.

name: Deep Dream Reconstruction
desc:
This passive system %s. The amount %s by the system depends on the %s, with the rate of repair decreasing with decreasing flux level. The system causes the ship to vent %s faster during active venting.

While the ship itself is easily and readily maintained by the Deep Dream generators, the Dream Generators themselves are disproportionately difficult to maintain, requiring unique and intricate pieces and extensive work hours to maintain peak operation - and not have the ship possibly eat itself and the crew. Maintenance cost increased by %s.
short: This ship will repair hull on active venting.

name: Safety Overrides (Fighter)
desc:
Disabling safety protocols increases the fighter's top speed in combat and allows the zero-flux engine boost to take effect regardless of flux level. The flux dissipation rate, including that of additional vents, is increasd.
 Reduces the peak performance time, prevents the use of active venting, and drastically reduces weapon ranges past 450 units.
short: Drastic improvement in performance, much lower peak time.

name: Safety Overrides (Locomotive)
desc:
Disabling safety protocols increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s/%s/%s (depending on ship size, with a corresponding increase in acceleration) and allows the zero-flux engine boost to take effect regardless of flux level. The flux dissipation rate, including that of additional vents, is increased by a factor of %s.

Reduces the peak performance time by a factor of %s, prevents the use of active venting. Due to the existing station infrastructure, the range of weapons is only drastically reduced past %s units.
short: Drastic improvement in performance, much lower peak time.

name: Accelerated Acquisition Computator
desc: The existing infrastructure originally used by the Advanced Targeting Core is instead occupied by several low-grade AI cores working in tandem to make effective on the fly targeting solutions, and continous weapon management to maintain peak weapon function. Autoaim targeting is improved by %s, weapon turn rate is increased by %s, recoil reduced by %s and recoil decay improved by %s.

name: Subliminal Encouragement System
desc: Using forbidden and prototypical Tri-Tachyon technology, subliminal mind-control process are built into the ship's life support and communication systems and used to improve the combat readiness of the crew by %s. However, the messaging can cause crew to act almost suicidally under combat situations to fulfil the subliminal orders, increasing combat readiness loss by a factor of %s past peak performance time. Installation of this system into the ship subsystems is incompatible with %s.

Out beyond the Core Systems, engineers and crew have learned several alternatives to keep ships running without easy access to manufactories, as well as keeping themselves alive under often harsh management policies.

Supply and fuel usage is reduced by %s, repairs are performed %s cheaper, and crew loss from hull damage and fighter loss is reduced by %s.

Further, on phasing irregularities can occur in the structure, causing new spatial regions to emerge into missing sections - although where these new sections come from is unclear. Jokes about the ship being a gateway to the Backrooms abound, although considering the way this ship works, it might not necessarily be untrue.
